title: Swimlane | Backend Software Engineer | Hyderabad
content:
**College**: Tier 1
**Education**: BTech( CSE )
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Previous Internship**: Yes
**Company**: Swimlane
**Title/Level**: Associate Software Engineer
**Location**: Hyderabad, India
**Base Salary**: 14,00,000
**Relocation**: 1,00,000
**Signing Bonus**: 1,00,000
**Shares**: 2500 (equivalent around 50 L)
**Vesting Period**: 1/4 in the first year and then monthy vesting for 3 years
**Bonus**: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
**Total comp 1st year (Base + Bonus + Stock)**: around 31 L
**Benefits**: Health insurance, monthly vesting period, flexible working hours, Hybrid culture

title: Innovaccer| SDE2 | Noida
content:

Years of Experience: 3.5 years
Prior Experience: Senior Software Engineer at Fintech Startup | Previously at other startups
Previous Comp : 26LPA (24fixed + 1L (JB)) + 14LPA ESOPs (Vested 4 year)

Date of the Offer: May '24
Company: Innovaccer
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: NCR
Salary: 27LPA (all fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  27LPA
Benefits: Standard Company Benefits

Need help to know how is work, work-life balance, teams and tech wise, growth potential ?
I am currently not working, left last company 3 months back.
Shall I wait for other offers or join this one?

title: Swimlane | SDE-1 | Hyderabad
content:
**College**: Tier 1
**Education:** BTech+MTech  (IT)
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Company**: [Swimlane](https://www.linkedin.com/company/swimlane)
**Title/Level:** Associate Software Engineer
**Location:** Hyderabad, India
**Base Salary:** 14,00,000
**Relocation**: 1,00,000
**Signing Bonus:** 1,00,000
**Stock bonus:**  2500 ESOPs vested over a 4-year period. 625 esops will be vested after completion of 1 years. Followed by 52 esops to be vested monthly therafter. Based on the current valuation, the total esops value amounts to 50 Lakhs (2500 esops)
**Bonus:** Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
**Total comp 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31,30,000 approx**
**Benefits:** Health insurance, **monthly vesting period**, flexible working hours

title: Swimlane SDE1
content:
**College**: Tier 1
**Education**: MTech in Computer Science
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Company**: Swimlane
**Title/Level:** Associate Software Engineer
**Location**: Hyderabad, India
**Base Salary**: 14,00,000
**Relocation**: 1,00,000
**Signing Bonus**: 1,00,000
**Stock bonus**: 2500 stocks vested over 4 years. You get 625 stocks at the end of 1st Year, thereafter every month you get 52 stocks. As per the current valuation total stock price is 50 Lakhs (2500). 
**Bonus**: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
**Total comp 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock)**: 31,30,000 approx
**Benefits**: Health insurance

title: Salesforce LMTS offer
content:
